018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.XMLATTRIBUTE_Id;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.isNotEmpty;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNotEmptyArgument;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getNMTokenValidator;
028
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.URISyntaxException;
031import java.time.Instant;
032import java.time.LocalDate;
033import java.time.LocalDateTime;
034import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.Set;
037
038import org.apiguardian.api.API;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.exception.IllegalOperationException;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.spi.Element;
042
043/**
044 *  <p>{@summary The definition of an XMLElement.}</p>
045 *  <p>The default implementation of the methods
046 *  {@link #addCDATA(CharSequence)},
047 *  {@link #addChild(XMLElement)},
048 *  {@link #addComment(CharSequence)},
049 *  {@link #addText(CharSequence)},
050 *  {@link #setAttribute(String, CharSequence, Optional)},
051 *  {@link #setNamespace(String)},
052 *  {@link #setNamespace(URI)},
053 *  {@link #setNamespace(String,String)},
054 *  {@link #setNamespace(String,URI)},
055 *  and
056 *  {@link #setNamespace(Namespace)}
057 *  will always throw an
058 *  {@link IllegalOperationException};
059 *  classes that implement this interface will have to provide appropriate
060 *  implementations for these methods if they want to support the respective
061 *  feature.</p>
062 *
063 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
064 *  @version $Id: XMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
065 *  @since 0.0.5
066 */
067@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyMethods", "unused"} )
068@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
069@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
070public interface XMLElement extends Element
071{
072        /*---------------*\
073    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
074        \*---------------*/
075    /**
076     *  The flags that are used to configure a new instance of
077     *  {@code XMLElement} (respectively an instance of an implementation of
078     *  this interface.
079     *
080     *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
081     *  @version $Id: XMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
082     *  @since 0.0.5
083     */
084    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: XMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
085    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
086    public static enum Flags
087    {
088        /**
089         *  The element allows children.
090         */
091        ALLOWS_CHILDREN,
092
093        /**
094         *  The element allows text.
095         */
096        ALLOWS_TEXT,
097
098        /**
099         *  Only valid attributes can be added to the element (if not set, any
100         *  attribut can be added).
101         */
102        VALIDATES_ATTRIBUTES,
103
104        /**
105         *  Only valid children can be added; this implies that
106         *  {@link #ALLOWS_CHILDREN}
107         *  is set; if the further is set, but this one not, any child can be
108         *  added.
109         */
110        VALIDATES_CHILDREN
111    }
112    //  enum Flags
113
114        /*-----------*\
115    ====** Constants **========================================================
116        \*-----------*/
117    /**
118     *  The indicator that values for an attribute should not be appended.
119     *
120     *  @see #setAttribute(String, CharSequence, Optional)
121     */
122    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
123    public static final Optional<? extends CharSequence> NO_APPEND = Optional.empty();
124
125        /*---------*\
126    ====** Methods **==========================================================
127        \*---------*/
128    /**
129     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code boolean} value as a {@code CDATA}
130     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
131     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
132     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
133     *  is used.</p>
134     *
135     *  @param  flag    The value.
136     *  @return This instance.
137     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
138     */
139    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
140    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Boolean.toString( flag ) ); }
141
142    /**
143     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
144     *  {@link Boolean}
145     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
146     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
147     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
148     *  is used.</p>
149     *
150     *  @param  flag    The value.
151     *  @return This instance.
152     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
153     */
154    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
155    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ).toString() ); }
156
157    /**
158     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code char} value as a {@code CDATA}
159     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
160     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
161     *  {@link Character#toString(char)}
162     *  is used.</p>
163     *
164     *  @param  c   The character.
165     *  @return This instance.
166     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
167     */
168    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
169    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final char c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Character.toString( c ) ); }
170
171    /**
172     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
173     *  {@link Character}
174     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
175     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
176     *  {@link Character#toString()}
177     *  is used.</p>
178     *
179     *  @param  c   The character.
180     *  @return This instance.
181     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
182     */
183    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
184    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Character c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( c, "c" ).toString() ); }
185
186    /**
187     *  Adds a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.
188     *
189     *  @param  text    The text.
190     *  @return This instance.
191     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
192     */
193    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalOperationException
194    {
195        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No text allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
196    }   //  addCDATA()
197
198    /**
199     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code double} value as a {@code CDATA}
200     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
201     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
202     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
203     *  is used.</p>
204     *
205     *  @param  number  The number.
206     *  @return This instance.
207     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
208     */
209    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
210    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final double number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Double.toString( number ) ); }
211
212    /**
213     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code enum} instance as a {@code CDATA}
214     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
215     *  <p>To convert the value to text, the method
216     *  {@link Enum#name()}
217     *  is used.</p>
218     *
219     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
220     *  @param  value   The value.
221     *  @return This instance.
222     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
223     */
224    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
225    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLElement addCDATA( final E value ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).name() ); }
226
227    /**
228     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
229     *  {@link Instant}
230     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
231     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
232     *  {@link Instant#toString()}
233     *  is used.</p>
234     *
235     *  @param  date    The date.
236     *  @return This instance.
237     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
238     */
239    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
240    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Instant date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
241
242    /**
243     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code int} value as a {@code CDATA}
244     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
245     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
246     *  {@link Integer#toString(int)}
247     *  is used.</p>
248     *
249     *  @param  number  The number.
250     *  @return This instance.
251     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
252     */
253    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
254    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final int number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Integer.toString( number ) ); }
255
256    /**
257     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
258     *  {@link LocalDate}
259     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
260     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
261     *  {@link LocalDate#toString()}
262     *  is used.</p>
263     *
264     *  @param  date    The date.
265     *  @return This instance.
266     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
267     */
268    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
269    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final LocalDate date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
270
271    /**
272     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
273     *  {@link LocalDateTime}
274     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
275     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
276     *  {@link LocalDateTime#toString()}
277     *  is used.</p>
278     *
279     *  @param  date    The date.
280     *  @return This instance.
281     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
282     */
283    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
284    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final LocalDateTime date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
285
286    /**
287     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code long} value as a {@code CDATA}
288     *  element to this XML element.}</p>
289     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
290     *  {@link Long#toString(long)}
291     *  is used.</p>
292     *
293     *  @param  number  The number.
294     *  @return This instance.
295     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
296     */
297    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
298    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final long number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( Long.toString( number ) ); }
299
300    /**
301     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
302     *  {@link Number}
303     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
304     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
305     *  {@link Number#toString()}
306     *  is used.</p>
307     *
308     *  @param  number  The number.
309     *  @return This instance.
310     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
311     */
312    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
313    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final Number number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( number, "number" ).toString() ); }
314
315    /**
316     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
317     *  {@link ZonedDateTime}
318     *  instance as a {@code CDATA} element to this XML element.}</p>
319     *  <p>To convert the date to text, the method
320     *  {@link ZonedDateTime#toString()}
321     *  is used.</p>
322     *
323     *  @param  date    The date.
324     *  @return This instance.
325     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
326     */
327    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
328    public default XMLElement addCDATA( final ZonedDateTime date ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addCDATA( requireNonNullArgument( date, "date" ).toString() ); }
329
330    /**
331     *  Adds a child to this element.
332     *
333     *  @param  <E> The implementation type for the {@code children}.
334     *  @param  child   The child to add.
335     *  @return This instance.
336     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given child is not valid for
337     *      this element.
338     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No children are allowed for this
339     *      element.
340     *  @throws IllegalStateException   The child has already a parent that is
341     *      not this element.
342     */
343    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
344    public default <E extends XMLElement> XMLElement addChild( final E child ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException, IllegalStateException
345    {
346        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No children allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
347    }   //  addChild()
348
349    /**
350     *  Adds a comment.
351     *
352     *  @param  comment The comment text.
353     *  @return This instance.
354     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No comment allowed for this element.
355     */
356    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
357    public default XMLElement addComment( final CharSequence comment ) throws IllegalOperationException
358    {
359        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No comment allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
360    }   //  addComment()
361
362    /**
363     *  <p>{@summary Adds predefined markup.}</p>
364     *  <p>The given markup will not be validated, it just may not be
365     *  {@code null}. So the caller is responsible that it will be proper
366     *  markup.</p>
367     *  <p>As the markup may be formatted differently (or not formatted at
368     *  all), the pretty printed output may be distorted when this is used.</p>
369     *
370     *  @param  markup  The predefined markup.
371     *  @return This instance.
372     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No children are allowed for this
373     *      element.
374     */
375    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
376    public default XMLElement addPredefinedMarkup( final CharSequence markup ) throws IllegalOperationException
377    {
378        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No children allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
379    }   //  addPredefinedMarkup()
380
381    /**
382     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code boolean} value as text to this
383     *  element.}</p>
384     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
385     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
386     *  is used.</p>
387     *
388     *  @param  flag    The value.
389     *  @return This instance.
390     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
391     */
392    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
393    public default XMLElement addText( final boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( Boolean.toString( flag ) ); }
394
395    /**
396     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
397     *  {@link Boolean}
398     *  instance as text to this element.}</p>
399     *  <p>To convert the boolean to text, the method
400     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
401     *  is used.</p>
402     *
403     *  @param  flag    The value.
404     *  @return This instance.
405     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
406     */
407    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
408    public default XMLElement addText( final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( requireNonNullArgument( flag, "flag" ).toString() ); }
409
410    /**
411     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code char} value as text to this
412     *  element.}</p>
413     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
414     *  {@link Character#toString(char)}
415     *  is used.</p>
416     *
417     *  @param  c   The character.
418     *  @return This instance.
419     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
420     */
421    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
422    public default XMLElement addText( final char c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( Character.toString( c ) ); }
423
424    /**
425     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided
426     *  {@link Character}
427     *  instance as text to this element.}</p>
428     *  <p>To convert the character to text, the method
429     *  {@link Character#toString()}
430     *  is used.</p>
431     *
432     *  @param  c   The character.
433     *  @return This instance.
434     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
435     */
436    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
437    public default XMLElement addText( final Character c ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( requireNonNullArgument( c, "c" ).toString() ); }
438
439    /**
440     *  Adds text to this element. Special characters will be escaped
441     *  according to the rules for the respective SGML flavour.
442     *
443     *  @param  text    The text.
444     *  @return This instance.
445     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
446     */
447    public default XMLElement addText( final CharSequence text ) throws IllegalOperationException
448    {
449        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No text allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
450    }   //  addText()
451
452    /**
453     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code double} value as text to this
454     *  element.}</p>
455     *  <p>To convert the number to text, the method
456     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
457     *  is used.</p>
458     *
459     *  @param  number  The number.
460     *  @return This instance.
461     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
462     */
463    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
464    public default XMLElement addText( final double number ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( Double.toString( number ) ); }
465
466    /**
467     *  <p>{@summary Adds the provided {@code enum} instance as text element to this
468     *  element.}</p>

471     *  is used.</p>
472     *
473     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
474     *  @param  value   The value.
475     *  @return This instance.
476     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    No text allowed for this element.
477     */
478    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
479    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLElement addText( final E value ) throws IllegalOperationException { return addText( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).name() ); }
480

583
584    /**
585     *  Returns the flags for this element.
586     *
587     *  @return The flags.
588     *
589     *  @see Flags
590     */
591    public Set<Flags> getFlags();
592
593    /**
594     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
595     *  <p>The method uses
596     *  {@link Boolean#toString(boolean)}
597     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
598     *
599     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
600     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value.
601     *  @return This instance.
602     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
603     *      not valid for the element
604     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
605     *      element.
606     */
607    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
608    {
609        return setAttribute( name, Boolean.toString( flag ) );
610    }   //  setAttribute()
611
612    /**
613     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
614     *  <p>The method uses
615     *  {@link Boolean#toString()}
616     *  to convert the provided flag to a {@code String}.</p>
617     *
618     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
619     *  @param  flag    The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
620     *      attribute will be removed.
621     *  @return This instance.
622     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
623     *      not valid for the element
624     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
625     *      element.
626     */
627    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final Boolean flag ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
628    {
629        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( flag ) ? Boolean.toString( flag ) : null );
630    }   //  setAttribute()
631
632    /**
633     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
634     *
635     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
636     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
637     *      attribute will be removed.
638     *  @return This instance.
639     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
640     *      not valid for the element
641     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
642     *      element.
643     */
644    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
645    {
646        return setAttribute( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ), value, NO_APPEND );
647    }   //  setAttribute()
648
649    /**
650     *  Sets the attribute with the given name.
651     *
652     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
653     *  @param  value   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
654     *      attribute will be removed.
655     *  @param  append  If not
656     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
657     *      ({@link #NO_APPEND}),
658     *      the new value will be appended to an already existing one, and the
659     *      provided char sequence is used as the separator.
660     *  @return This instance.
661     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
662     *      not valid for the element
663     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
664     *      element.
665     */
666    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
667    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final CharSequence value, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> append ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
668    {
669        throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "No attributes allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
670    }   //  setAttribute()
671
672    /**
673     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
674     *  <p>The method uses
675     *  {@link Double#toString(double)}
676     *  to convert the provided number to a {@code String}.</p>
677     *
678     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
679     *  @param  number   The attribute's value.
680     *  @return This instance.
681     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
682     *      not valid for the element
683     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
684     *      element.
685     */
686    public default XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final double number ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
687    {
688        return setAttribute( name, Double.toString( number ) );
689    }   //  setAttribute()
690
691    /**
692     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name.}</p>
693     *  <p>The method uses
694     *  {@link Enum#name()}
695     *  to convert the provided value to a {@code String}.</p>
696     *
697     *  @param  <E> The concrete enum type of {@code value}.
698     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute; the name is case-sensitive.
699     *  @param  enumValue   The attribute's value; if {@code null} the
700     *      attribute will be removed.
701     *  @return This instance.
702     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
703     *      not valid for the element
704     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
705     *      element.
706     */
707    public default <E extends Enum<E>> XMLElement setAttribute( final String name, final E enumValue ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
708    {
709        return setAttribute( name, nonNull( enumValue ) ? enumValue.name() : null );
710    }   //  setAttribute()
711

725     *      element.

850    /**
851     *  <p>{@summary Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided
852     *  value is not empty.}</p>
853     *
854     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
855     *  @param  value   The value for the attribute; can be {@code null}.
856     *  @return This instance.
857     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
858     *      not valid for the element
859     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
860     *      element.
861     */
862    @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
863    public default XMLElement setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final CharSequence value ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
864    {
865        if( isNotEmpty( value ) ) setAttribute( name, value );
866
867        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
868        return this;
869    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
870
871    /**
872     *  Sets the attribute with the given name if the provided value is not
873     *  empty.
874     *
875     *  @param  name    The name of the attribute.
876     *  @param  optional   The value for the attribute.
877     *  @return This instance.
878     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
879     *      not valid for the element
880     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
881     *      element.
882     */
883    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UnusedReturnValue"} )
884    public default XMLElement setAttributeIfNotEmpty( final String name, final Optional<? extends CharSequence> optional ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
885    {
886        requireNonNullArgument( optional, "optional" ).ifPresent( value -> setAttribute( name, value ) );
887
888        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
889        return this;
890    }   //  setAttributeIfNotEmpty()
891
892    /**
893     *  <p>{@summary Sets the id for the element.}</p>
894     *  <p>The value will be validated using the method that is provided by a
895     *  call to
896     *  {@link XMLBuilderUtils#getNMTokenValidator()}.</p>
897     *
898     *  @param  id  The id.
899     *  @return This instance.
900     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    An attribute with the given name is
901     *      not valid for the element or the value is not a valid NMToken.
902     *  @throws IllegalOperationException   No attributes are allowed for this
903     *      element.
904     */
905    public default XMLElement setId( final String id ) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalOperationException
906    {
907        if( !getNMTokenValidator().test( requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) ) ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( format( "Invalid id: %s", id ) );
908        final var retValue = setAttribute( XMLATTRIBUTE_Id, id );
909
910        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
911        return retValue;
912    }   //  setId()
913
914    /**
915     *  Sets the given namespace.
916     *
917     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
918     *  @return This instance.
919     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
920     *      element.
921     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
922     */
923    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException, URISyntaxException
924    {
925        final var namespace = new Namespace( identifier );
926        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
927
928        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
929        return retValue;
930    }   //  setNamespace()
931
932    /**
933     *  Sets the given namespace.
934     *
935     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
936     *  @return This instance.
937     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
938     *      element.
939     */
940    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final URI identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException
941    {
942        final var namespace = new Namespace( identifier );
943        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
944
945        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
946        return retValue;
947    }   //  setNamespace()
948
949    /**
950     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given namespace.}</p>
951     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
952     *  provided by
953     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
954     *
955     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
956     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
957     *  @return This instance.
958     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
959     *      element.
960     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
961     */
962    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException, URISyntaxException
963    {
964        final var namespace = new Namespace( prefix, identifier );
965        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
966
967        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
968        return retValue;
969    }   //  setNamespace()
970
971    /**
972     *  <p>{@summary Sets the given namespace.}</p>
973     *  <p>The given prefix is validated using the method that is
974     *  provided by
975     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils#getPrefixValidator()}.</p>
976     *
977     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
978     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
979     *  @return This instance.
980     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
981     *      element.
982     */
983    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier ) throws IllegalOperationException
984    {
985        final var namespace = new Namespace( prefix, identifier );
986        final var retValue = setNamespace( namespace );
987
988        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
989        return retValue;
990    }   //  setNamespace()
991
992    /**
993     *  Sets the given namespace.
994     *
995     *  @param  namespace   The namespace.
996     *  @return This instance.
997     *  @throws IllegalOperationException    Namespaces are not allowed for this
998     *      element.
999     */
1000    public default XMLElement setNamespace( final Namespace namespace ) throws IllegalOperationException
1001    {
1002        throw new IllegalOperationException( format( "No namespace allowed for element '%1$s'", getElementName() ) );
1003    }   //  setNamespace()
1004
1005    /**
1006     *  {@inheritDoc}
1007     */
1008    @SuppressWarnings( "AbstractMethodOverridesAbstractMethod" )
1009    @Override
1010    public <E extends Element> void setParent( final E parent );
1011}
1012//  interface XMLElement
